Ruapuna Motorsport Park, Christchurch View map

price.text: Multiple transport options will be available to make getting to Ruapuna Raceway easy and hassle-free over the event weekend. View directions Google Maps . Spectators parking here will need to show a valid ticket to the event (including all passengers in the vehicle) and a valid NZ mobility parking permit clearly displayed on the front windscreen of the vehicle. Entry to this carpark for valid mobility car parking permits is free.

price.text: This is an R18 event, 12:00 – 7:30pm • Doors open 12:00pm Ticket info Find out more Be part of the action Get amongst all the action on and off the field. Watch thrilling, fast paced polo matches, stomp the divots, try polo for yourself on top of our hitting boxes, meet the polo players, check out our epic DJ line-up on the main stage, enjoy the delicious offerings from our food and beverage partners or try out one of the activations. Tickets on sale now for General Admission, VIP and Corporate Hosting in our Private Marquees. It’s truly an experience like no other! Get valuable updates and news straight to your inbox.
